title: Motor racing-Formula One drivers' form sheet
text: May 23, 2018 / 1:02 AM / Updated 15 hours ago Motor racing-Formula One drivers' form sheet Reuters Staff 3 Min Read May 23 (Reuters) - Formula One drivers' form sheet ahead of Sunday's Monaco Grand Prix (listed in championship order and with the most recent races first): Number=race result, R=retired, DQ=disqualified, NS=did not start, NQ=did not qualify. 2018 2017 ES AZ CN BH AU/AE BR MX US JP MY SG IT BE HU GB AT AZ CA MC ES RU BH CN AU Lewis Hamilton 1 1 4 3 2 2 4 9 1 1 2 1 1 1 4 1 4 5 1 7 1 4 2 1 2 Sebastian Vettel 4 4 8 1 1 3 1 4 2 R 4 R 3 2 1 7 2 4 4 1 2 2 1 2 1 Valtteri Bottas 2 14 2 2 8 1 2 2 5 4 5 3 2 5 3 2 1 2 2 4 R 1 3 6 3 Kimi Raikkonen R 2 3 R 3 4 3 3 3 5 NS R 5 4 2 3 5 14 7 2 R 3 4 5 4 Daniel Ricciardo 5 R 1 R 4 R 6 R R 3 3 2 4 3 R 5 3 1 3 3 3 R 5 4 R Max Verstappen 3 R 5 R 6 5 5 1 4 2 1 R 10 R 5 4 R R R 5 R 5 R 3 5 Fernando Alonso 8 7 7 7 5 9 8 10 R 11 11 R 17 R 6 R R 9 16 -
